TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DesignerDataTableBase extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Defines the properties and methods shared between data-store tables and data-store views.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase> class is one of several types that represent the schema of a data store at design-time. These schema items are made available to controls by designers implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface. Controls access schema objects by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> method of the interface.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase> class provides the properties and methods shared between data tables in a data store and views defined on those data tables.
When you inherit from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase> class, you must override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.CreateColumns%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the table or view.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance. This constructor can be called only by an inherited class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, string owner) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the table or view.
The data-store owner of the table or view.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance. This constructor can be called only by an inherited class.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of columns defined for a table or view.
Docs.value: A collection of columns defined for a table or view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.Columns%2A> property is populated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.CreateColumns%2A> method the first time the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.Columns%2A> property is accessed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ICollection CreateColumns() cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns a collection of data-store column objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.CreateColumns%2A> method is called the first time the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataTableBase.Columns%2A> property is accessed, to populate the collection of data-store columns.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the data-store table or view.
Docs.value: The name of the data-store table or view.

Docs.summary: Gets the owner of the data-store table or view.
Docs.value: The owner of the data-store table or view.
